description.narrative: By the end of 2019, a model of Adolescent-Friendly Schools is being implemented in two states, designed to reduce school drop-out and improve learning results as well as strengthen the participation of adolescents in the school setting., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019 positive opportunities for adolescent development and participation are expanded in more inclusive school and community environments, increasing educational access, inclusion and achievement, and adolescentsÂ´ resilience and capacity to protect themselves from violence, exploitation and crime, and to prevent early pregnancy.

description.narrative: UNICEF increased access to and inclusion in education, especially for Mexican adolescents at risk of dropping out, by focusing on secondary education, and promoted adolescent empowerment and participation through the Generation Unlimited initiative. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020
